/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and complexity to the image. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue sky and green trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and vehicles.
